jobTitle: Remote Tax Manager / Senior Tax Manager (Top Regional Firm)
description:
We are one of the premier mid-sized CPA firms in the Region serving High Net worth clients and also industries like technology, construction, real-estate, and Healthcare / Medical. We have a unique firm split into three key areas of focus - Tax & Audit, Wealth Management and Small Business Accounting.

We pride ourselves on our culture and are one of the few firms around spreading around the work to limit the grind during busy seasons. Work life balance is important to us and we are looking to bring on Remote Tax Managers and Senior Tax Managers to our team. If this sounds like a fit, please read on!

Top Reasons to Work with Us

  • Fantastic Work/Life Balance including long weekends when not in season!
  • 401k Match
  • Full Medical, Dental & Vision
  • Kind and caring corporate culture from top to bottom
  • Excellent career growth opportunity
  • 5 Weeks PTO + Holidays offered to start

What You Need For This Position

  • 4-10+ years minimum of relevant experience & CPA are required
  • Experience in individual tax compliance, planning
  • Tax research experience (RIA)
  • Gift, estate, and trust return experience would be a plus
  • Experience in partnerships & S Corps tax
  • Outgoing and friendly personality a team player
  • Forward-thinking and always looking for ways to improve, learn, and grow
  • Desire and ability to train, mentor/lead, and develop staff

What's In It For You/Benefits

We offer competitive compensation and world class benefits and perks. Please inquire for more information!

  • Vacation/PTO
  • Medical
  • Dental
  • Vision
  • 401k
  • Bonus

Benefits
